name: asthobin
description: AsthoBin is a simple website to share pieces of code with a URL, written in Rust.

scripts.build: npx tailwindcss build -i static/assets/css/index.css -o static/assets/css/tailwind/index.css -c tailwind.config.js
scripts.build-pnpm: pnpx tailwindcss build -i static/assets/css/index.css -o static/assets/css/tailwind/index.css -c tailwind.config.js
scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run autoprefixer && npm run minify
scripts.prod-pnpm: pnpm run build-pnpm && pnpm run autoprefixer && pnpm run minify

author: Asthowen <contact@asthowen.fr>
